export const Services = (props) => { const pagesDefinition = require("../data/data.json"); return (

{pagesDefinition.titleServices}

{pagesDefinition.paragraphServices}

{props.data ? props.data.map((d, i) => (
{d.title}

{d.text}

{d.subText}

)) : 'Loading...'}
) }
